page.title: 06Beaches in St. Andrews
page.content: There are four beaches in St. Andrews. {The Castle Sands}are situated beside the ancient Castle of St. Andrews.This is a small, shaded, pebbly beach with a small outdoor swimming pool. {The East Sands}are next to the picturesque harbour. This beach has soft yellow sand and is quite long. {The West Sands}are beside the Old and Jubilee Golf Courses and are about two miles in length.This beach has soft yellow sand and is very popular with tourists. {The Step Rock Beach}is just around the corner from the West Sands.It is quite small and is very pebbly.The old outdoor swimming pool there is now out of use.
